hero-dog.png.prompt: Professional photo of a golden retriever wearing a high-tech delivery harness with LED lights and GPS collar, carrying a thermal food delivery bag, standing confidently on a city sidewalk with modern buildings in background, cinematic lighting, ultra-realistic

app-mockup.png.prompt: Modern smartphone mockup showing a sleek delivery app interface with a map tracking a dog's delivery route, clean UI design with purple and blue gradients, order status showing 'Rex is on his way!'

dog-team.jpg.prompt: Group photo of 5 different dog breeds (golden retriever, border collie, german shepherd, husky, labrador) all wearing matching high-tech delivery gear, sitting in formation at a modern automated hub station with solar panels and charging stations

thermal-container.jpg.prompt: Close-up product shot of a sleek, lightweight thermal delivery container with RFID lock, LED temperature display, and aerodynamic design, sitting on white background with soft shadows

customer-happy.jpg.prompt: Happy family (parents and two kids) receiving food delivery from a friendly golden retriever at their front door, the dog is wagging its tail, warm evening lighting, suburban home setting

city-map.jpg.prompt: Aerial view of city district with animated delivery routes shown as glowing blue lines connecting restaurants to homes, multiple dog icons moving along the routes, high-tech visualization overlay
